attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
China was granted the 2008 Games in the understanding that
     their HUMAN RIGHTS records would improve IT IS NOW WORSE FACTS
     To build the stadiums the authorities forcibly evicted people
     from their homes. Over 3 million people are locked up in
     political concentration camps. They fund the Government of
     Sudan, despite the Tragedy of DARFUR the mounting death toll
     and human right abuses. S.SPIELBERG has walked away from his
     role in the games The Backing of the JUNTA in BURMA whose human
     rights abuses is renowned. THE ILLEGAL INVASION AND OCCUPATION
     OF TIBET continues to this day Beijing’s air is so polluted
     that it will seriously damage the athlete’s performance CHINA
     IS RESPONSIBLE FOR 90% of all FAKE GOODS produced in the world
     and are flooding the world with FAKE MEDICINE

     OVER ONE MILLION PEOPLE DIE EACH YEAR IN AFRICA FROM FAKE
     MEDICINE 

I reqest that the PM, hold taks with China over these concerns.
